name: V_EHI_IMD_FILTER_RESEARCH
description: View used in EHI exports to filter remittance image records by research enrollment.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record. A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the patient contact associated with the remittance image record.
